scripts.install:xvfb: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libgtk2.0-0 && sudo apt-get install libgtk-3-0 && sudo apt-get install libgbm-dev && sudo apt-get install libnotify-dev && sudo apt-get install libgconf-2-4 && sudo apt-get install libnss3 && sudo apt-get install libxss1 && sudo apt-get install libasound2 && sudo apt-get install libxtst6 && sudo apt-get install xauth && sudo apt-get install xvfb
scripts.test:e2e: npx nuxi build && start-server-and-test 'nuxt start' :3000 'cypress run --e2e --record --key 36c8cc55-fdd7-4b22-8e54-42efe61430a8'
scripts.test:e2e:dev: npx nuxi build && start-server-and-test 'nuxt start' :3000 'cypress open --e2e'
